mapper.sql:
select id, account_id accountId, to_account_id toAccountId, order_type orderType, order_no orderNo, order_frorm_id orderFrormId, order_source orderSource, order_amount orderAmount, order_state orderState, ret_message retMessage, create_time createTime, last_modify_time lastModifyTime, thirdparty_type thirdpartyType, charge_amount chargeAmount
from t_gq_fund_order
